info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 07 at 1:56AM CST until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHWESTERN ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 156 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Little Bayou Meto Park, or 18 miles north of Dumas, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Langford... Little Bayou Meto Park... Sarassa... Reydell... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
